product_name: SmartWool Hike Medium Crew Socks - Girls' - 2012 Closeout
long_description: Designed for rugged day hikes and moderate backpacking, the girls' all-purpose SmartWool Hike Medium Crew Socks keep small feet drier and more comfortable mile after mile. Made from soft merino wool blended with nylon, these socks wick moisture away from your feet to preserve warmth in the cool seasons. Spandex stretch delivers all-day comfort; supportive arch braces add stability and help keep socks in place. Flat-knit toe seams won't cause irritation. Closeout.
short_description: Designed for rugged day hikes and moderate backpacking, the girls' all-purpose SmartWool Hike Medium Crew Socks keep small feet drier and more comfortable mile after mile.
